cast.overview: Behrani, an Iranian immigrant buys a California bungalow, thinking he can fix it up, sell it again, and make enough money to send his son to college. However, the house is the legal property of former drug addict Kathy. After losing the house in an unfair legal dispute with the county, she is left with nowhere to go. Wanting her house back, she hires a lawyer and befriends a police officer. Neither Kathy nor Behrani have broken the law, so they find themselves involved in a difficult moral dilemma.
cast.title: House of Sand and Fog

details.biography: Ray Abruzzo (born August 12, 1954) is an American actor best known for his roles as Little Carmine Lupertazzi on The Sopranos, Detective Michael McGuire on The Practice (1998-2004), and Tony Giuliano on Night Court (1989-1991).
details.name: Ray Abruzzo
details.place_of_birth: Queens, New York City, New York, USA
